name: matrix_sum
description: The program should compute the sum of all the elements of matrix a and store it in s.
precondition: n = N && m = M && 0 <= N && 0 <= M && (A qi : 0 <= qi < N : (A qj : 0 <= qj < M : a[qi][qj] = A[qi][qj]))
postcondition: s = (SUM qi : 0 <= qi < N : (SUM qj : 0 <= qj < M : A[qi][qj]))
invariants: n = N && m = M && 0 <= M && 0 <= i <= N && s = (SUM qi : 0 <= qi < i : (SUM qj : 0 <= qj < M : A[qi][qj])) && (A qi : 0 <= qi < N : (A qj : 0 <= qj < M : a[qi][qj] = A[qi][qj]))

n = N && m = M && 0 <= i < N && 0 <= j <= M && s = (SUM qi : 0 <= qi < i : (SUM qj : 0 <= qj < M : A[qi][qj])) + (SUM qj : 0 <= qj < j : A[i][qj]) && (A qi : 0 <= qi < N : (A qj : 0 <= qj < M : a[qi][qj] = A[qi][qj]))
